title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, embed, generate completions via simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama for chat, embeddings and tool-calling in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama powered by Textual; browse, pull, chat and manage models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple idiomatic interface for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, function-calling, RAG, fine-tune adapters, LangGraph agents.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and NixOS service module.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks with Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators and embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: OpenAI-compatible plugin that proxies ChatGPT calls to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-like desktop UI but backed by Ollama models; cross-platform Electron app.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Tutorial repo showing how to create custom Mistral/LLaMA adapters and load them into Ollama.
